system.description: Whenever you handle or examine something interesting, roll+weird.

failure.label: Complications
failure.value: Treat a miss as though you’ve opened your brain to the world’s psychic maelstrom and missed the roll.

partial.label: Partial Success
partial.value: On a hit, you can ask the MC questions. On a 7–9, ask 1.

success.label: Success
success.value: On a hit, you can ask the MC questions. On a 10+, ask 3.

system.choices:
• Who handled this last before me?
  • Who made this?
  • What strong emotions have been most recently nearby this?
  • What words have been said most recently nearby this?
  • What has been done most recently with this, or to this?
  • What’s wrong with this, and how might I fix it?
